me.Abhigya.core.menu.inventory.action

Class ItemClickAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.menu.inventory.action.ItemClickAction

  • public class ItemClickAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing Item click action in menu.
